title: G510 How do I customize the home screens?
answer:
To add a widget to a home screen, touch the Menu key then Widgets and drag the
desired widget to the home screen.
To move an item on a home screen, touch and hold the item, drag it to the desired area,
and release your finger.
To uninstall (remove) an application from a home screen, touch and hold the application,
drag it to the trash can in the upper section, and release your finger.
To change the screen transition effect, touch the Menu key then Transitions and select
the desired effect.
To change the wallpaper, touch the Menu key then Wallpapers and select Wallpapers,
Live Wallpaper, or Gallery.
